name: You Give Me Get Roll
description:
Global Game Jam 2021

Team XiaoTangYuan
HaoTian-Ding
DaBongo
Cloud

The game is simple, you are a lost coin and you gotta roll all the way back to your owner's pocket through the sewer tunnel. Use keyboard arrows to control, don't be afraid and just roll!

Control：
Direction Keys
[R] Key to Restart
